MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.19pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Stoneykirk Road substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:33pm on Tuesday, 27 October 2020
